## Security Checklist

### Input Handling
- [ ] Input validation added for all user inputs
- [ ] No unsanitized user data in logs
- [ ] Unicode inputs handled correctly

### Code Security
- [ ] No hard-coded credentials or secrets
- [ ] No unsafe XML/SQL/command execution
- [ ] XXE protection in place for XML parsing
- [ ] Log injection prevented

### Testing
- [ ] Unit tests included for new functionality
- [ ] Security tests included for attack scenarios
- [ ] Integration tests included for key flows
- [ ] All existing tests pass
